title: Tailfin Mini Pannier bags might actually make you consider panniers for bikepacking
content:
Ever since they introduced their first carbon rack meant for road bikes, Tailfin has been drawing up clever solutions for carrying gear on a bike. For their latest addition, Tailfin is reimagining the humble pannier with a line of mini Panniers that look perfect for bikepacking. Tailfin admits that pannier bags don’t have the best […]

The post Tailfin Mini Pannier bags might actually make you consider panniers for bikepacking appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
